speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thanks. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your account. Can you please verify your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. And could you confirm your date of birth as well?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you for verifying that information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I need some time to gather the funds.

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate that. When do you think you can make the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a partial payment of $100 next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. Can I confirm a date for you to make that payment?

speaker: Agent
text: Next Friday works for me. Thank you for your cooperation.
